changeSet.author: ruslan
ruslan
changeSet.sql: create or replace view apps.calc_period_and_data_types_v as SELECT pdt.* ,doctl.short_name doc_type_short_name ,pttl.name period_type_name ,dttl.name data_type_name FROM apps.calc_period_and_data_types pdt LEFT JOIN apps.dm_doc_types doc on doc.code = pdt.doc_type_code LEFT JOIN apps.dm_doc_types_tl doctl on doctl.doc_type_id = doc.id and doctl.lang = adm_cfg.adm_locale LEFT JOIN apps.calc_period_types_tl pttl on pttl.code = pdt.period_type_code and pttl.lang = adm_cfg.adm_locale LEFT JOIN apps.calc_data_types_tl dttl on dttl.code = pdt.data_type_code and dttl.lang = adm_cfg.adm_locale

changeSet.author: ruslan
changeSet.comment: Creating foreign constraint: plan_production_plan_lines to plan_volume_ee_lines
